tgt_original: 欲處色處無色處，若欲覺此者，以無相為藥； 是我所非我所，愛欲所念，以無願為藥。 四顛倒各自有藥，何等為各自有藥？

src_original: duḥkhe sukhasañjñāyā duḥkhā sarvasaṃskārā iti cikitsāḥ anātmīye ātmīyasañjñāyā anātmāna  sarvadharmā iti cikitsāḥ aśubhe śubhasañjñāyāḥ śāntaṃ nirvāṇam iti cikitsāḥ
tgt_original: 一者有常以無常為藥，二者有樂以苦為藥，三者有言是我所以非我所為藥，四者有身以觀為藥。

src_original: KP.95 catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni kāyevedanācittadharmasanniśritānāṃ cikitsāḥ kāye kāyānupasyī viharati na ca kāye kāyānupāśyanāyām ātmyadṛṣṭyāṃ patati /  vedanāyāṃ vedanānupaśyī viharati na ca vedanānupaśyanāyā ātmadṛṣṭīgatena patati /  citte cittānupaśyī viharati na ca cittānupaśyanāyāṃ jīvadiṣṭīye patati /  dharme dharmānupaśyī viharati na ca dharmānupaśyanāyāṃ pudgaladṛṣṭīye patati /
tgt_original: 四意止以身心為念，是為藥；

src_original: catvāri samyakprahāṇāni sarvākuśaladharmaprahāṇāya cikitsā /
tgt_original: 四意斷一切惡悉斷，是為藥；

src_original: sarvakuśaladharmapāripūryaiḥ saṃvartante /  catvāro dṛddhipādāḥ kāyacittapiṇḍagrāhotsargāya saṃvate /
tgt_original: 四神足念合會成身以空棄為藥；

src_original: cikitsāḥ pañcendriyāṇi pañca balāni aśrādvyakausīdyamuṣitasmṛticittavikṣepaasamprajanyatāduṣprajñātācikitsāḥ
tgt_original: 五根五力不信懈怠念功德為藥；

src_original: sapta bodhyaṅgāni dharmasamūhājñānasya cikitsāḥ āryāṣṭāṅgo mārga dauṣprajñāsarvaparapravādināṃ
tgt_original: 七覺意入法黠是為藥；

src_original: KP.97 tatra kataraṃ lokottaraṃ jñānabhaiṣajyaṃ /
